statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ISNULL(C1.SortOrder, 9999), C1.Name, ISNULL(C2.SortOrder, 9999), C2.Name, ISNULL(C3.SortOrder, 9999), C3.Name, ISNULL(C4.SortOrder, 9999), C4.Name, ISNULL(C5.SortOrder, 9999), C5.Name) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Category1 , AA.Category2 , AA.Category3 , AA.Category4 , AA.Category5 , AA.SortOrder , AA.UseYn , AA.InfoNoticeID , AA.Description
, C1.Name as Category1Name , C2.Name as Category2Name , C3.Name as Category3Name , C4.Name as Category4Name , C5.Name as Category5Name
, II.Name as InfoNoticeName
FROM dbo.TCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem C1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category1 = C1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem C2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category2 = C2.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem C3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category3 = C3.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem C4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category4 = C4.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem C5 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category5 = C5.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TInfoNotice II WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.InfoNoticeID = II.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
AND AA.Category1 = #Category1#
AND AA.Category2 = #Category2#
AND AA.Category3 = #Category3#
AND AA.Category4 = #Category4#
AND AA.Category5 = #Category5#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* , BB.Name as InfoNoticeName FROM dbo.TCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TInfoNotice BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.InfoNoticeID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCategory ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Category1, Category2, Category3, Category4, Category5, InfoNoticeID, UseYn, SortOrder, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Category1#, #Category2#, #Category3#, #Category4#, #Category5#, #InfoNoticeID#, #UseYn#, #SortOrder#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCategory SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Category1 = #Category1# , Category2 = #Category2# , Category3 = #Category3# , Category4 = #Category4# , Category5 = #Category5# , InfoNoticeID= #InfoNoticeID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
